page.title: 16CHURCH/SCHOOL LINK
page.content: The{church provided a school}for local children{in 1849.}The{original {building,}next to the church, was {occupied}with additional buildings both permanent and prefabricated, {until 1980.}A{new building,}for Infants only, the nucleus of a promised new school, on the southern edge of the village, was{occupied in {1962.}The school existed on the two sites until amalgamated on the southern site in 1980. The old school buildings were taken over for church use as the Parish Rooms. The status of the school changed to a {Controlled School in 1948,}having been a{National School}in its earlier years {The Vicar takes scripture lessons weekly, alternating between the two junior classes. Worship and religious teaching has a{christian basis,}and {school services are held in the church
